query:
-- Thulusdhoo Island Dive Sites
INSERT INTO activity_spots (name, islandGuideId, spotType, slug, latitude, longitude, difficulty, description, bestSeason, bestTime, coralCoverage, marineLife, maxDepth, minDepth, published) VALUES
('Banana Reef', 1, 'dive_site', 'banana-reef-thulusdhoo', 4.2333, 73.2667, 'beginner', 'Iconic banana-shaped reef with excellent coral formations and abundant fish life. Perfect for beginners and intermediate divers.', 'March to October', 'Morning (6am-10am)', '95% hard coral', 'Grouper, snapper, trevally, reef sharks', 30, 5, 1),
('Miyaru Kandu', 1, 'dive_site', 'miyaru-kandu-thulusdhoo', 4.2350, 73.2680, 'intermediate', 'Drift dive through a channel with strong currents. Great for experienced divers seeking pelagic encounters.', 'March to October', 'Morning (6am-9am)', '80% coral', 'Manta rays, eagle rays, trevally, sharks', 35, 10, 1),
('Ari Atoll Housereef', 1, 'dive_site', 'ari-atoll-housereef', 4.2300, 73.2650, 'beginner', 'House reef with gentle slopes and abundant marine life. Excellent night diving location.', 'Year-round', 'Any time', '90% coral', 'Octopus, squid, lionfish, grouper', 25, 3, 1);

-- Male City Area Dive Sites
INSERT INTO activity_spots (name, islandGuideId, spotType, slug, latitude, longitude, difficulty, description, bestSeason, bestTime, coralCoverage, marineLife, maxDepth, minDepth, published) VALUES
('Artificial Reef', 2, 'dive_site', 'artificial-reef-male', 4.1667, 73.5167, 'beginner', 'Sunken ship and artificial structures creating unique dive site. Good for photography and exploration.', 'Year-round', 'Morning (7am-11am)', '50% coral', 'Grouper, snapper, fusiliers', 28, 5, 1),
('Malé Reef', 2, 'dive_site', 'male-reef', 4.1700, 73.5200, 'intermediate', 'Steep wall dive with excellent coral coverage and pelagic fish. Suitable for intermediate divers.', 'March to October', 'Morning (6am-10am)', '85% coral', 'Trevally, jacks, snappers, sharks', 40, 15, 1);

-- Rasdhoo Island Dive Sites
INSERT INTO activity_spots (name, islandGuideId, spotType, slug, latitude, longitude, difficulty, description, bestSeason, bestTime, coralCoverage, marineLife, maxDepth, minDepth, published) VALUES
('Madivaru Kandu', 3, 'dive_site', 'madivaru-kandu-rasdhoo', 4.2667, 73.1333, 'advanced', 'Powerful drift dive through a channel. Strong currents attract large pelagic fish and sharks.', 'March to October', 'Early morning (5am-8am)', '70% coral', 'Sharks, manta rays, trevally, jacks', 40, 15, 1),
('Rasdhoo Kandu', 3, 'dive_site', 'rasdhoo-kandu', 4.2680, 73.1350, 'intermediate', 'Channel dive with moderate currents and excellent coral formations. Good for intermediate divers.', 'March to October', 'Morning (6am-10am)', '85% coral', 'Grouper, snapper, trevally, rays', 35, 10, 1),
('Veligandu Kandu', 3, 'dive_site', 'veligandu-kandu-rasdhoo', 4.2700, 73.1400, 'intermediate', 'Beautiful channel with steep walls and abundant marine life. Popular for manta ray encounters.', 'March to October', 'Morning (6am-10am)', '80% coral', 'Manta rays, eagle rays, grouper, sharks', 38, 12, 1);
